name: Legal Entity for Om Meeting
description: A discussion together about the eventual creation of an associative non-profit legal structure to give more ground to the project and collaborate with the Natural park administration.

name: Dormitory
description: Building a dormitory to be able to offer more comfort to participants and guests.

name: Clean and fix the fire place + bread oven
description: To bring back the fire for gatherings.

name: Gutters + IBC
description: To install gutters to harvest more rain water from the roof and protect foundations and prevent erosion.

name: Coral into a pergola
description: Transforming the west side of the coral into a shaded space with vines growing on a pergola bridging the pillars.

name: Securing chicken free range area
description: To build and secure a permanent free range area for chickens in between the garden and the chicken coop.

name: Proper dry toilet cabin
description: To build a proper comfortable dry toilet.
